attributes.action: Stop head teachers of failing schools being able to jump ship before OFSTED inspections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On many levels a school knows when they are NOT doing their job as they should, they also know the gap between OFSTED inspections.
We feel if OFSTED find a school to be failing in any way and feel previous management to blame then that headteacher should not be allowed to get away with it and should still be answerable as they are otherwise free to go on and make the same mistakes at their new school.
